stateRules: Hospital-based NFs with highest rates in US ($553-$2201/day). 20 facilities.

LOOK FOR: Files with 'nursing-facility-price-based-rates' in filename. Multiple periods per year (quarterly updates). Table format with 'Skilled Nursing Facility Name' column and 'Skilled Nursing Facility Rate' column.
LOOK FOR: Files starting with 'allrt' (these are the main rate files)
291 NF facilities with annual rate letters. Clean extraction from Excel.

LOOK FOR current 2024-2025 rate files matching these patterns: 'RSProvRatecCmpDataNF' (Provider Rate Component), 'NF_Rates' with dates, 'NF_Provider_Rate_Update', 'Provider+Rate+Component', or 'NFR-' files from 2024-2025. EXCLUDE: All Fact Sheets, Private Room, Ventilator, IV Therapy, MDS, PDPM, Guidance, FAQs, memos, and files before 2024.

RETURN ONLY indices for CHC-MPR files from 2024-2025. These are files 1-8: 'q4-2025-chc-mpr', 'q3-2025-chc-mpr', 'q2-2025-chc-mpr', 'q1-2025', 'q4-update' (2024), 'q3-2024-update', 'April-2024_CHC-MPR', '2024-01-01-CHC-Minimum-Payment-Rates'. EXCLUDE ALL: County rates, non-county rates, nursing facility rates, condensed rates, and any files without 'CHC' or 'MPR' in the name.

LOOK FOR: Files named 'standard-payments-to-nursing-facilities' or 'standard-nursing-facility-rates' with effective dates October 2024 or 2025. EXCLUDE: Supplemental payments, user fees, COVID payments, or older files

LOOK FOR: Current nursing facility (NF) rate files for 2024-2026. Files follow pattern '202XX NF Rates' where X is year (4-5) and quarter (1-4). Include quarterly files from Q1 2024 through current quarter 2026. EXCLUDE: Files before 2024, non-NF rates, or any supplemental documents.
